params.initialOwner: Address that will own the contract

returns._0: Array of report IDs for the contract
Whether the contract is being monitored

params._reportId: ID of the vulnerability report to resolve

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pauseContract(address).details: Callable by contract owner, agent, or registry owner

params._contractAddress: Address of the contract to pause

registerContract(address).details: Only callable by anyone, but requires contract to be unregistered

params._contractAddress: Address of the contract to monitor

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._high: Number of high severity vulnerabilities found
params._ipfsHash: IPFS hash containing the full audit report
params._low: Number of low severity vulnerabilities found
params._medium: Number of medium severity vulnerabilities found

returns._0: reportId ID of the created vulnerability report

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._contractAddress: Address of the contract to unpause

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with the initial owner

getContractReports(address).notice: Get all reports for a contract

getMonitoredContractsCount().notice: Get total number of monitored contracts

getVulnerabilitySummary(address).notice: Get vulnerability summary for a contract

isMonitored(address).notice: Get monitoring status of a contract

isPaused(address).notice: Get pause status of a contract

reportVulnerability(address,string,uint8.notice: Submit vulnerability report (only callable by agent)
